itemDescription: Bermudian association football player and manager (born 1970)

wikipedia_page.main: Devarr Boyles (born 18 July 1970) is a retired Bermudian professional football player and now manager. He has coached Dandy Town Hornets in Bermuda since 2018.

response: *Devarr Boyles (born 1970), retired Bermudian professional football player and now manager
